website_summaries.verdict: Stylish two-pack of functional and hangable storage solutions. We like the cubbyhole design for easy access.
pros: The seven open compartments and three removable drawers make this an ideal addition to your nursery
Easily hang it in an existing closet, or install a rail for exposed hanging and easy access
Made from durable material that is easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase, unless it is designed better.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a major design flaw. It can't support anything due to cardboard being its main source of support. Message to the company: You need to use a thin piece of plastic or wood where it velcros the bar. That is way it can hold more than 3 shirts without bending.
customer_reviews.author: S.Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing my cleaning closet
customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing my cleaning closet. Used to store paper towels, tissue boxes, trash bags, first aid, and water filters nicely. You get two per the packages which is great for the price. Love that it has the drawers at the bottom. Probably going to use the other one in my bedroom closet but haven’t decided yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 2 pack so my husband and i could have our own. We used it to replace our dresser which takes up a lot of floor space. It holds everything we would put in the dresser which were mostly undergarments, socks, shorts and pajamas (we hang all shirts, pants, sweaters, etc). It does bow a little at the top due to the weight of everything but it still holds up just fine! :)
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD FOR STORING LIGHTWEIGHT THINGS
customer_reviews.text: Really love this set in my kids closet. I have a closet that's shared between my 2 year old and 5 week old baby for their things. This set is what I use for my 5 week old baby's onesies, plush blankets, socks, muslin blankets, bibs, etc. The reason I took off one star is because they are somewhat slanted & the shelving doesn't fit all the way in the slots. Other than those minor issues, I really love it in this space.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Tee B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! So super excited to have these. They work really well in my kiddos closet.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me organized
customer_reviews.text: I think it does the job!! Its sturdy, but the top sags a bit. I don’t have heavy stuff in mine. Sweaters and sweatshirts mostly, some sandals at the top. It’s functional and it does the job I need it too. Fine for now!!!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.text: The pullout drawers with the reinforced bottom is great to be able to add extra storage in closets, no matter how full they are. Allows you to keep what would otherwise be a mess into a nice, organized and clean looking closet. Holds up to and beyond its rated capacity. I have used it for both clothes and shoes and a combination of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Cash Hickethier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Organizing My Sewing Room!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to organize my extensive stash of fabric and sewing notions. I was able to consolidate all of my fabric and notions into one organizer, and use the other for work in progress. It is so nice to quickly see the fabric I have (so I won't buy more), and have dedicated storage for work in progress. Plus, the pull-out drawers are perfect for organizing less visually appealing notions such as elastic and binding tape. I would recommend these to any fabric/yarn hoarder!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using this for organizing my 3mo clothes, blankets, burp rags, etc. It's been working great. I use the other in my 3yo's room for some of her clothes. The room is small so it's nice to have this option for organizing her clothes in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Karisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my husband because I literally take up too much storage space. This has helped maximize our space its sturdy and stores his pajamas, socks, underwear, gym clothes and tops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall though... : }
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I feel it should have been cheaper a pack of 2 and the exact color described it came on time for sure and it was wrinkled upon opening if that's a big deal. its exactly like the thin flimsy material majority are made of, therefore not for playful people I personally don't have a lot to store, so it works for me and my socks. but I do know it may be troublesome to store a lot if you choose to do so. at that point you're really just pushing it to tear annnd there goes your money.
customer_reviews.author: Looney Tunes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organization
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this organizer for one of my niece's baby shower gifts. She absolutely loved it. With all the compartments included, she's able to have all the essentials ready for baby upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Organised
customer_reviews.text: Organized multiple items and was great for our nursery closet. Slightly flimsy and drawers are a two handed job, but overall it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MontyG

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE AT ALL...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE COLOR... AND SIZE... BUT IT IS NOT DURABLE AT ALL... I NOTICED AROUND DAY 3 THAT THE STITCHING WAS COMING APART IN ONE OF THE CUBBIES... IT WOULD BE A PERFECT PRODUCT IF IT WAS A STRONGER MATERIAL... I DONT LIKE TO THROW MONEY AWAY... SO I WILL PROBABLY FIND A WAY TO REENFORCE THE RIPPED AREAS... MAYBE JUST THE WHOLE PRODUCT IT SELF...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly pretty surprised at the quality once it arrived. I ordered this for our new baby’s room instead of a dresser because we were having a hard time finding once we liked that was worth the price, and it happened to match the other bins I ordered perfectly—total accident that was discovered when they showed up but a huge plus. The pictures provided when ordering don’t really do it justice. The fabric is a pretty textured gray and it’s easy to hang—the price is definitely better than anything I came across anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Tip when weight is added.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok but it's hard to slide out the boxes. Also if they are full they lean toward the ground potentially dumping stuff into the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: The closet organizers arrived quickly and have been a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: The closet organizers arrived quickly and have been a huge help for me as I created mini set ups for both of my boys in a downstairs closet (their room is upstairs in our house) so that I did not have to run up and down the stairs all day as I recover from giving birth.
customer_reviews.author: J Reed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to help organize our closet; this was such an amazing find! Will most likely buy more for other closets. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t hold shape very well when full but decent storage
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay F.

customer_reviews.title: Great organization product for our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for organizing our infant's clothes and blankets in his nursery. I also love that we don't have to worry about anchoring a dresser to the wall. The drawers are a little flimsy, but it's fabric so that's to be expected. Overall I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR A STUDIO APT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I have a studio apartment and not much room. This is ideal for the closet.
customer_reviews.author: ❤️OUR COUNTRY🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty perfect for our newborn’s room. It was extremely easy to put together and really helped us organize baby clothes. Both organizers were the perfect height for the closet and both fit in just fine. Simple and easy - 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of kids dressers and got these. No regrets. Wish i had these in college. Liked em so much for the kids i put them in my closet. All i need really.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and hold up of this product seems pretty poor. For its price I would have expected a little bit more but it will still do the job for my nursery. I just expect the flimsiness of the product means it’s longevity will be limited.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Good idea just did not hold up. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Quick Storage Addition
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for baby stuff. Hangs and provides quick storage.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Williams

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The top started bending when I put my things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Aliha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Use these to organize my daughters closet & they’re perfect. Love the drawers so I can put their socks & little things in them.
customer_reviews.author: amanda vega

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish was different with this product is the “shelving” pieces. I wish they were a little bit sturdier. It’s just cloth in the dividers so when you put stuff in the slots it sinks down and it’s not flat. But other than that it’s exactly how it looks in the pictures and fits well in our closet.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Meisenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy looks great in the closet in my sons nursery! I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find - Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These were great and exactly what I needed to finish off our nursery organization. An absolute fantastic value getting two and they’re very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Could be better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but I wish it was better quality. The top droops downwards without any weight in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I thought but cute and work

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 👍 👌
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase . Looks great and is sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our baby's nursery. All of our baby's nick knacks fit well in each cubby. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Organize Closet!
customer_reviews.text: This helped organize my baby's closet! I love them and am very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have been a god send in my babys nursery! Will buy more for my little boys’ room!

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!

customer_reviews.title: Shelves/cubby holes are flemsie
customer_reviews.text: Shelves need more support. When putting 2t clothes on them they brag. Hate to think what something heavier than a 2 year olds clothes would do
customer_reviews.author: Christopher milam

customer_reviews.title: It still works fine juat a bit annoying
customer_reviews.text: The middle dividers are very flimsy. It just says down if you put anything heavier than a pair of socks. It still works fine juat a bit annoying, besides that no complains.

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative than a Dresser!
customer_reviews.text: Enough space! Helped so much! Great alternative than a dresser!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Huge help organizing my child’s Room! And my’room too! Love this product! Does the trick and doesn’t cost a lot!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. The quality could be a little better which is why I give it four stars.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a lot of weight but works for a little clothing, small light shoes and things like that.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son in college. Works great, good value!

customer_reviews.title: Shelves are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The hanging storage organizer is perfect for our nursery closet. Set up was easy and organizer leaves plenty of floor space under it. Good quality product.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for 2 pack and I only received one.

customer_reviews.title: Can possibly bend at the top
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for my kids sheets, blankets, burp cloths, shoes, towels, wash cloths, etc. & so far, it’s been good. . Besides the top of one is bending a bit, but otherwise - it’s worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Adds extra space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for twins and adds way more closet space. Would def recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! I ended up ordering again for one of my extra bedrooms.

customer_reviews.title: Love the drawers option
customer_reviews.text: Color was exactly as described. Love the drawers option. Great quality.

customer_reviews.text: I love that this has drawers. I wish the shelves were sturdier, they easily buckle under the weight of a few items.

customer_reviews.title: Like this

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great material, nice and thick. Works really well for lightweight items. I love them.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & drawers are nice
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my son’s nursery closet. It’s great for storing those extra blankets, sheets, and seasonal clothes. I liked the small drawers that came with it too because they’re perfect for socks and tiny shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing a nursery due to the fact most items are light weight! I'd be weary adding anything that can be on the heavier side.

customer_reviews.title: Used for nursery closet an they work great. Perfect amount of room and holds quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for nursery closet an they work great. Perfect amount of room and holds quite a bit of weight.

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I'm looks ok. It's mostly fine, but it broke immediately. I didn't even finish putting things in it. Not sure if this is a design or manufacturing error, but either way I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: George Hine

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and did its job well. Nice color, good fabric, very sturdy so far I like them very much. my closet looks very organized now.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization
customer_reviews.text: The shelves were exactly what I thought they would be. Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Desiree'

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect for quick, easy extra storage in your closet. Just don’t plan on storing a lot of heavy items, it’s pretty flimsy. But it was perfect for what I used it for-my nursery closet. Stored a lot of blankets and diapers and baby clothes. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great for decluttering any closet!
customer_reviews.text: I love it for my kids extra toys and shoes!
customer_reviews.author: DIANA R Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: These are great and definitely serve it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are great and definitely serve it's purpose. An awesome way to make the most of your closet space. It saves you from having to purchase more storage furniture. These are working great in my baby's closet.

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby items.
customer_reviews.text: A bit wider than expected, but perfect none the less.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby storage in closet & holds alot. Be perfect if more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Organize light items
customer_reviews.text: I like them, just maybe not for organizing anything semi heavy, like diapers or wipes....

customer_reviews.title: There really good for kid rooms
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the space it has for different things
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure about this one!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good space saver but durability is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item to put baby items in the compartments, such as socks, t-shirts, and pacifiers. These items are not heavy meaning there is not much weight to the bulk of what I needed for the storage organizer . After a few months the center compartment bottom tore from the side thus one of the two items I spent almost 40 dollars, is now trash. The other bottoms bowed. I would comment the manufacture must expect you to store tissue or feathers in the compartments. I suggest if you are looking for hanging storage, look elsewhere. I did find a replacement item from a different company that is strong and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Denisezzz

customer_reviews.title: This is not a great design. I haven't used these for anything heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a great design. I haven't used these for anything heavier than t shirts, yet after only a month the weight of the organizers is causing a buckling of the fabric which is only stabilized by thin cardboard. Also the "drawers" are not easy to use because the sides are only fabric without any reinforcement. I'll probably replace these with a version that is anchored across the entire top section.
customer_reviews.author: EWS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter when she was born. I didn't have room or time to really look for a dresser and she was here, so I saw these online and decided to get them. It's a space saver as well as enough room for her little outfits and wraps. She's 4 months now and still using them. Will probably last for the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Nani Vang

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Most of the closet organizers I have seen have thin shelves and are expensive for the quality that you receive. This one has three drawers. One large one and two that fit on the same square. They can be used as separate storage bins. I am using them as nursery storage for my toddler and newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Aurie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very useful specifically if you want more space in your closet. It has multiple compartments. You can fit shoe, t-shirts, socks, and pants in it. Built with high-quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Behzad

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to start organizing our nursery. These hanging shelves were the perfect fit. There’s lots of space and so far I’m really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Family

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It didnt last very long for me. I just started using it and I only have baby blankets and baby towels in it and it snapped at the top. Other than the break on one, I really like it cause its letting me hold off on buying furniture. Still pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dominoe lamattina

customer_reviews.title: Good for any closet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, the pack of two is perfect and it has so much space. I didn't even use it as a nursery closet, works perfectly for any closet. It honestly saved so much space in my closet and I still have room for more, awesome purchase will not regret!!
customer_reviews.author: christine dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great for more storage and organizing!
customer_reviews.text: These were larger than I thought and provide a lot of storage in a closet. I have them in my son’s closet and know it will be used for many years to come! It is a bit flimsy so heavy things should be put on the bottom otherwise it droops into the next shelf.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.text: These are holding up nicely, the dividers need a little extra support to stay flat so I put some sturdy pieces of cardboard in.

product_meta.title: mDesign Soft Fabric Over Closet Rod Hanging Storage Organizer with 7 Shelves and 3 Removable Drawers for Child/Kids Room or Nursery - Textured Print - 2 Pack - Gray
feature_bullets: INSTANT ORGANIZATION: It is easy to add convenient custom storage to any kids closet with this over rod accessory organizer; All of their accessories and clothing items will be neat and organized; 7 open compartments store and organize clothing, shoes, accessories, receiving blankets, diapers, baby wipes, creams, ointments, lotions and more; Includes 3 removable drawers that provide more discreet storage; Set of 2

STYLISH STORAGE: These soft storage organizers keep closets and nursery room clutter under control by storing all of your little one's essentials in one convenient place; Great for closets in bedrooms, hallways, entryways, mudrooms and more; mDESIGN TIP - Try these in the play room to organized puzzles, games, books, stuffed animals, plush toys, dolls, cars and other items; Combine with other matching mDesign closet organizers to make a custom storage system

FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE: Maximize unused space and create extra storage in any closet; Great for baby, children, tweens, teens and adults; Use these anywhere you want to add some style to your organizational needs; Simply hang over standard-sized closet rods, the easy to use hook & loop closure will keep the product secure; Installs in minutes, no tools required; Folds down compactly for storage when not in use
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of breathable non-woven synthetic fabric; Easy Care - wipe clean with a damp cloth and allow to air dry
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Each Measures 11.75" x 11.75" x 53" high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars390 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
